articles.title: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Intel, Micron, Tesla, Palantir, Microsoft, GM, Ciena, and More
articles.content: Intel stock trades higher following a report that says Apollo Global Management offered to make a $5 billion investment in the chip maker, Tesla stock flirts with turning positive for the year, and shares of Palantir and Microsoft are downgraded.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 16 Early Demand Deemed Healthy
articles.content: Early sales data suggests “healthy demand” for Apple’s iPhone 16 family overall, JPMorgan said. Apple stock dipped on Monday.

articles.title: Apple’s Late-Day Plunge Stirs Speculation Over Who Was Selling
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Friday was supposed to be a good day for the shares of Apple Inc., with the iPhone maker set to be a big winner from the quarterly adjustment of major stock indexes.
